description: A smart contract for a simple, tamper-proof election system for a small community or club. It manages voter registration and identity verification, assigns a single vote per verified identity, and immutably records votes. Once the voting period ends, the contract automatically tabulates and publicly declares the winner.

functions.name: registerVoter
functions.description: Registers a voter by adding their address to the voter registry.

functions.name: startVotingPeriod
functions.description: Starts the voting period by setting the end time based on the provided duration.

functions.name: vote
functions.description: Allows a registered voter to cast a vote for a candidate.

functions.name: declareWinner
functions.description: Automatically tabulates votes and declares the winner after the voting period ends.

modifiers.name: onlyDuringVotingPeriod
modifiers.description: Ensures that the function can only be called during the voting period.

modifiers.name: onlyAfterVotingPeriod
modifiers.description: Ensures that the function can only be called after the voting period has ended.

modifiers.name: onlyOnce
modifiers.description: Ensures that the winner can only be declared once.
